title: Environment Variable Support for DEBUG/VERBOSE
details:
Added environment variable support for DEBUG and VERBOSE modes in the Notebook Automation CLI.

## Features Implemented:

### 1. Environment Variable Support:
- **DEBUG environment variable**: Can be set to "true", "1", or "yes" to enable debug mode
- **VERBOSE environment variable**: Can be set to "true", "1", or "yes" to enable verbose mode
- **Command line precedence**: Environment variables are checked first, command line args are fallback

### 2. Enhanced Help Display:
- **Source indication**: Shows whether debug/verbose is enabled via environment or command line
- **Clear status display**: 
  - "Debug Mode: Enabled via ENV âš¡" (from environment)
  - "Debug Mode: Enabled âš¡" (from command line)
  - "Verbose Mode: Enabled via ENV ðŸ“¢" (from environment)
  - "Verbose Mode: Enabled ðŸ“¢" (from command line)
  - "Debug Mode: Disabled" / "Verbose Mode: Disabled" (when off)

### 3. Implementation Details:
- **Helper methods**: `IsDebugModeEnabled()` and `IsVerboseModeEnabled()` centralize logic
- **Environment detection**: Checks environment variables first, then command line args
- **Consistent behavior**: All debug/verbose detection throughout the app uses these methods
- **Visual indicators**: Uses âš¡ for debug mode and ðŸ“¢ for verbose mode with color coding

### 4. Benefits:
- **Developer convenience**: No need to always type --debug or --verbose
- **CI/CD integration**: Easy to set environment variables in build pipelines
- **Persistent settings**: Environment variables persist across terminal sessions
- **Transparency**: Clear indication of setting source in help display

## Usage Examples:
```bash
# Set via environment variable
$env:DEBUG="true"
$env:VERBOSE="true"
na.exe  # Will show debug and verbose enabled via ENV

# Set via command line (overrides environment if both present)
na.exe --debug --verbose  # Will show enabled without "via ENV"

# Mixed usage
$env:DEBUG="true"
na.exe --verbose  # Debug via ENV, Verbose via command line
```

## Files Modified:
- `src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Cli/Program.cs`
